TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Ngta, title = Ngta, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ngta} }

S.FORM: == ngta == ngta ga baq mebazing. bazing ga pinbazing na yaya ngta.sraral bnkis taga zngta qu spngun nha pptuliq. ngta ga blaq balay niqun hi nya.muawx lpyung ga yasa spqaniq ta lpung. nnu'un pgluw sa hi' na ngta tmahuk qu topu' ga, sbing balay ayang nya'.

== ngta == ngta ga baq mebazing. bazing ga pinbazing na yaya ngta.sraral bnkis taga zngta qo spngon nha pptoliq. ngta ga blaq balay niqon hi nya.moawx lpyong ga yasa spqaniq ta lpong. nno'on pglow sa hi' na ngta tmahok qo topo' ga, sbing balay ayang nya'.
